name: Nobero Zipper Hoodies for Man Stylish
description: Crafted from 280 GSM cotton blend fleece, this regular-fit zipper hoodie delivers warmth and soft comfort. Designed for winter wear, it layers easily for casual outings, gym sessions, or everyday use while maintaining a clean, durable finish.

name: Bewakoof® Men's White Warrior King Graphic Printed Oversized T-shirt
description: Made from premium dense 100% cotton single jersey, this oversized graphic t-shirt offers breathable comfort and a relaxed drape. Ideal for summer casual wear, it suits daily outings, street styling, or laid-back looks with effortless ease.

name: The Indian Garage Co Men Tartan Checked Casual Shirt
description: Made from a comfortable cotton blend, this regular-fit tartan checked shirt offers breathable ease and everyday comfort. Designed for all-season casual wear, it pairs well with jeans or chinos for office days, outings, or relaxed weekend styling.

name: OneMile Men's Hyperflex Work Shacket - Jacket for men
description: Made from a polyester-rayon-elastane stretch blend, this regular-fit work shacket offers flexibility and lightweight comfort. Designed for all-season wear, it suits office days, travel, or smart-casual outings while staying wrinkle-free, breathable, and easy to maintain.

name: The Souled Store Souled Army Men and Boys Round Neck Blue Embroidered Cotton Oversized Full Sleeve T-Shirts
description: Crafted from soft 100% cotton, this oversized full-sleeve t-shirt offers breathable comfort with a relaxed drape. Designed for casual wear, it works well for daily outings or street styling while delivering a clean look with subtle embroidered detailing.

name: Lymio Hoodie|| Sweatshirt for Unisex || Unisex Hoodie and Sweatshirt
description: Made from lightweight polyester fabric, this regular-fit hoodie offers easy warmth and everyday comfort. Designed for winter casual wear, it works well for daily use, travel, or relaxed outings while maintaining a clean, versatile look.

name: OFFICIAL MARVEL MERCHANDISE Men's Black Panther Mech Graphic Printed Oversized T-shirt
description: Crafted from premium dense 100% cotton, this oversized graphic t-shirt delivers breathable comfort and a relaxed drape. Ideal for summer casual wear, it suits street styling, outings, or daily use while offering bold visual appeal and easy movement.

name: The Souled Store The King Men and Boys Short Sleeves Round Neck Black Graphic Printed Cotton Oversized T-Shirts
description: Crafted from soft 100% cotton, this oversized graphic t-shirt offers breathable comfort and a relaxed drape. Designed for summer wear, it suits casual outings, daily use, or streetwear styling while delivering bold print appeal and all-day ease.

name: Thomas Scott Men's Cotton Slim Fit Premium Corduroy Long Sleeve
description: Made from cotton lycra corduroy, this slim-fit shirt offers soft stretch comfort with a structured feel. Designed for winter casual wear, it delivers a sharp silhouette suitable for daily use, outings, or relaxed occasions with all-day ease.

name: The Souled Store Cotton Linen Stripes
description: Crafted from an 85% cotton and 15% linen blend, this regular-fit striped shirt feels lightweight and breathable. Designed for summer comfort, it works well for casual outings, office wear, or everyday styling while maintaining a clean, polished look.

name: Bewakoof Official Naruto Merchandise Men's 100% Cotton 220 GSM Graphic Print Oversized Fit Round Neck T-Shirt
description: Made from 220 GSM 100% cotton, this oversized graphic t-shirt delivers breathable comfort and a relaxed fit. Ideal for summer wear, casual outings, travel, or streetwear styling, it pairs easily with jeans, joggers, or shorts.

name: Los Angeles Printed Hoodies Sweatshirt Polycotton for Running, Gym Warm Travel Hoodies for Men
description: Made from soft polycotton fabric, this regular-fit printed hoodie offers breathable warmth and everyday comfort. Ideal for winter workouts, travel, or casual wear, it pairs easily with joggers or jeans for a relaxed, sporty look.

name: SMOWKLY Men’s Collar Chain Cotton Fleece Sweatshirt
description: A comfortable fleece hoodie designed for everyday winter wear. Features a regular fit, hooded neck, and durable printed design. Easy to style with jeans or joggers for casual outings and daily use.

name: NOBERO Men Printed Hooded Sweatshirt
highlights: Soft fleece fabric focused on warmth, not breathability
Regular fit with hood and kangaroo pocket — standard street hoodie build
Printed design is the main value driver here
description: This is a fleece-based printed hoodie made for winter comfort and visual appeal. The fabric is warm and soft, the fit is predictable, and the print does the talking. Not premium, not technical — but a solid pick only if bought under ₹1,000.

name: Trillion Regular Fit Printed Hoodie for Men | Sweatshirt for Men
highlights: Soft polyester blend fabric, lightweight and breathable
Regular fit with hooded neck for everyday comfort
Long sleeves with standard length for all-season use
description: A straightforward polyester hoodie built for daily wear. Comfortable, lightweight, and easy to maintain, it delivers decent warmth and durable prints—ideal if you want a no-fuss, budget-friendly hoodie for regular use.

name: DarkBuck® Anime Luffy Gear 5 Graphic Oversized T Shirt for Men and Women Drop Shoulder Loose Baggy Fit Unisex Pure Cotton T-Shirt
highlights: 100% bio-washed cotton for soft, breathable comfort
Oversized, drop-shoulder baggy fit for a relaxed, street-ready look
Half sleeves with round collar, standard length
description: DarkBuck’s Luffy Gear 5 oversized T-shirt blends comfort with statement style. Made from bio-washed cotton, it features a drop-shoulder baggy fit and high-definition graphic print. Perfect for anime fans and casual streetwear lovers alike.

name: PDK Fashion Anime Couple Print Long Sleeves Winter Hoodie with Front Pocket Men's & Women's Sweater
description: A relaxed-fit fleece hoodie designed for warmth and casual comfort. Hooded neck with drawstring and long sleeves make it suitable for lounging or light outdoor use. Print adds character, but overall quality stays basic and budget-oriented.

name: Veirdo® Cotton Fleece Regular Fit Hooded Sweatshirt Lastest Back Graphic Printed Winter Hoodies for Men
description: A regular-fit fleece hoodie designed for winter casual wear, featuring bold back graphics and a drawstring hood. Comfortable and warm enough for daily use. Style stands out, but fabric quality sits in the mid-range, not premium.

name: U.S. Polo Assn. Men Striped Polo Collar Pure Cotton Slim Fit T-shirt
highlights: Slim fit with regular length for a sharp, tailored look
description: U.S. Polo Assn. striped polo crafted from 100% cotton. Slim fit and regular length offer a clean silhouette, while the polo collar and button closure elevate casual style. Perfect for everyday wear or weekend outings.

name: TAGAS Hoodie for Men|Sweatshirt for Man Stylish | Hooded (Sweatshirt) for Mans| Winter Wear for Mans
highlights: Long sleeves with hooded neck design
description: Regular fit TAGAS hoodie crafted from soft fleece with 5% stretch for easy movement. Features long sleeves, hooded neck, and pullover design. Perfect for winter layering, casual outings, or comfortable everyday wear.

name: The Souled Store Marvel: Venom Symbiote Men and Boys Short Sleeves Round Neck Blue Graphic Printed Cotton Oversized T-Shirts
highlights: Oversized fit for relaxed streetwear style
description: Official Marvel Venom T-shirt in an oversized fit, crafted from 100% cotton for comfort. Features short sleeves, crew neck, and high-definition graphic print. Ideal for casual outings, daily wear, or adding superhero style to your wardrobe.

name: Allen Solly Men Polo | Half Seelves Regular Fit | 60% Cotton with Banded Collar
description: A solid half-sleeve polo with a banded collar, crafted from a 60/40 cotton-polyester blend. Regular fit and standard length make it comfortable for daily casual wear. Easy-care fabric, made in India, delivers dependable mid-range quality.

name: Moda Rapido Men Red Solid Hooded Sweatshirt
description: A solid red hooded pullover sweatshirt made from 100% cotton. Regular fit with ribbed hem and long sleeves makes it comfortable for daily wear. Simple and functional, but fabric is mid-range — warmth and durability are average.

name: Men Jeans || Jeans for Men || Cargo Jeans
description: Regular-fit cotton denim cargo jeans with a drawstring and pockets for practical use. Zipper closure and standard length make them suitable for daily casual wear. Fabric is durable for mid-range usage, but not premium-grade denim.

name: Allen Solly Men's Classic Cotton Solid Hooded Sweatshirt with Kangaroo Pockets
description: A solid Popcorn-fabric shirt with a regular fit, long sleeves, and spread collar. Lightweight and breathable, it’s suitable for casual, work, or semi-formal occasions. Comfort and versatility are the focus; fabric is mid-range, not premium.

name: Roadster The Life Co. Hooded Sweatshirt
description: A grey hooded sweatshirt made from a cotton-poly blend with a regular fit and ribbed finish. Kangaroo pocket adds practicality. Comfortable for everyday winter use, but warmth and fabric quality remain average, not premium.

name: NOBERO Sweatshirts for Man Stylish | 280 GSM Rich Cotton Fleece Solid Regular Fit Full Sleeve Sweatshirt for Men | Stylish Casual Wear Winter Sweatshirt for Men
description: A solid regular-fit sweatshirt made with 280 GSM cotton-poly fleece for warmth and comfort. Clean design makes it easy to layer or wear solo. Reliable for winter daily use — quality is good for the price, not premium-tier.

name: Roadster The Lifestyle Co Men White Sneakers
highlights: Classic white round-toe sneakers with lace-up closure
description: Basic white casual sneakers with lace-up design and a cushioned footbed for comfort. Synthetic upper and textured sole make them easy to pair with jeans or chinos. Decent everyday pick, though build quality and durability are just average.

name: Timex Men Black Brass Dial & Black Bracelet Style Straps Analogue Watch TWTG80SMU10
highlights: Black brass dial with analogue display
30 m water resistance for daily splashes
description: A classic black-dial analogue watch with a brass case and black stainless-steel bracelet. Quartz movement keeps time reliably, and 30 m water resistance handles daily use. Basic but versatile — not luxury, yet dependable for everyday wear.

name: HRX by Hrithik Roshan Men Black Solid Active Bomber Jacket
highlights: Regular-fit active bomber jacket with full-zip closure
Breathable, lightweight build for mild cold
description: A versatile men’s active bomber by HRX with a full-zip front, breathable polyester fabric, and zippered pockets. Designed for mild cold and everyday sporty use — solid basics, not high-end winter insulation.

name: HIGHLANDER Men Slim Fit Light Fade Stretchable Jeans
highlights: Light fade wash for casual style
description: Slim-fit stretchable jeans with a light fade wash built for everyday casual wear. Comfortable mid-rise design and classic 5-pocket layout make these easy to pair with tees or shirts — solid daily denim without premium quality claims.

name: The Modern Soul Half Zipper Solid Sweatshirt for Men
description: A half-zip sweatshirt made from a polyester-blend fabric with a modern fit. Easy to wear and remove, suitable for casual winter outings or daily use. Comfort is decent, but fabric feel and warmth are strictly mid-range.

name: The Souled Store Men Relaxed Shirts
description: A solid pure cotton shirt built for everyday comfort and clean styling. Breathable fabric makes it easy to wear all day, while the minimal design keeps it versatile. Quality is decent for regular use, not premium tailoring.

name: H&M Loose Fit Sweatshirt
description: A midweight cotton-poly sweatshirt with a brushed interior for comfort. Loose fit with dropped shoulders gives a relaxed silhouette without going oversized. Works well for casual winter layering — decent quality, nothing premium, priced for everyday use.

name: KAJARU Men's Polyester Blend T Shirt with Spread Collar Neck Line Zipper Closure Full Sleeves Solid Pattern Regular Fit and Standard Length
description: A full-sleeve polo-style T-shirt made from polyester-lycra blend for stretch and easy maintenance. Quarter-zip collar adds a modern touch. Comfortable for daily casual or light active use — fabric feel is functional, not premium.

name: NOBERO Printed Hoodies for Man | 280 GSM Rich Cotton Fleece Hooded Full Sleeve Sweatshirt for Man | Stylish Casual Wear Winter Hoodies for Men
highlights: 280 GSM cotton fleece for winter use
description: A regular-fit hoodie made with 280 GSM cotton-poly fleece, offering decent warmth and everyday comfort. Soft on the inside with a basic streetwear look. Not luxury, but solid value for winter daily wear and casual outings.

name: Veirdo® Pure Cotton Oversized Baggy Fit Drop Shoulder Stylish and Latest Graphic Printed Round Neck Half Sleeves T-Shirt for Men
description: An oversized pure-cotton graphic tee built for relaxed streetwear fits. Drop-shoulder cut and breathable fabric keep it comfortable for daily wear. Prints do the talking — quality is decent for the price, not premium fashion territory.

name: The Indian Garage Co Men's Cotton Slim Fit Checkered Full Sleeves Cutaway Collar Casual Shirt
description: A slim-fit cotton checkered shirt designed for everyday comfort and versatility. Breathable fabric and a clean cutaway collar keep it wearable across casual outings and workdays. Good value at the price, but stitching and finish remain mid-tier.

name: Veirdo® Polycotton Spun Oversized Fit Drop Shoulder Hooded Sweatshirt Full Sleeves Solid Jumper Hoodie for Men/Boys
description: An oversized drop-shoulder hoodie made from polycotton fleece for a relaxed streetwear look. Comfortable for casual winter wear and layering. Fit and style stand out more than fabric quality — this is mid-range comfort, not premium build.

name: Allen Solly Men's Classic Cotton Solid Hooded Sweatshirt with Kangaroo Pockets
description: A cotton-rich hooded sweatshirt with a regular fit and kangaroo pocket, designed for everyday winter wear. Comfortable and breathable with decent warmth. Build quality is reliable, but you’re paying partly for the brand, not just the fabric.

name: LEOTUDE Half Sleeve Oversized Cottonblend Round Neck Drop Shoulder Printed Men's T-Shirt
description: An oversized drop-shoulder T-shirt made from a cotton-blend fabric for everyday comfort. Relaxed fit and printed design give it a trendy streetwear look. Quality matches the price — good for casual use, not built for longevity.

name: TAGAS Hoodie for Men|Sweatshirt for Man Stylish | Hooded (Sweatshirt) for Mans| Winter Wear for Mans
description: A budget polyester-fleece hoodie designed for light winter use. Regular fit and minimal stretch keep it wearable for daily errands or lounging. Warmth and durability are average — this is value pricing, not long-term premium quality.

name: Lymio Sweatshirt || Hoodie for Unisex || Unisex Hoodie and Sweatshirt
description: A basic unisex sweatshirt made from polyester with a regular fit and round neck. Works as light winter layering or indoor wear. Comfort and durability are average — you’re paying for the price point, not premium quality.
